settings.title: A Make your Own IEM Workshop
settings.content: The Headphone Zone x Final Audio MAKE 4 offers a unique DIY experience, allowing you to tune a brand-new IEMs as per your taste. You needn't be a fancy audio engineer to be able to make these IEMs as you don't really have to deal with disassembling the earphone’s body. In this unique experience, you will be guided by the Headphone Guru’s and indeed your fellow audiophiles to expose your sound preferences and tune an IEM from scratch that you can truly call your “OWN”

settings.title: Featuring The Final Audio MAKE 4
settings.content: Final Audio MAKE 4 allows you to find your own sound. Once you find your perfect sound signature, this award-winning IEM is designed to give you the finest listening experience taking advantage of cutting-edge Japanese engineering and design. The IEMs feature a special "MAKE dial" for tuning adjustments and a newly developed "f-Core for MAKE" drivers resulting in one of the finest IEMs from Final Audio.

settings.title: Take Home an IEM That’s a Perfect Reflection of You and Your Music.
settings.content: Hosted by Headphone Zone, this workshop is just perfect for all audio enthusiasts. You'll have a timeless product and an unforgettable experience to take back home.

settings.text: A Make your Own IEM Workshop

Once you find your perfect sound signature, this award-winning IEM is designed to give you the finest listening experience taking advantage of cutting-edge Japanese engineering and design. The IEMs feature a special "MAKE dial" for tuning adjustments and a newly developed "f-Core for MAKE" drivers resulting in one of the finest IEMs from Final Audio.

settings.text: Take Home an IEM That’s a Perfect Reflection of You and Your Music.

settings.content: Hosted by Headphone Zone, this workshop is just perfect for all audio enthusiasts. You'll have a timeless product and an unforgettable experience to take back home.

1. A set of Final MAKE 4 earphones worth ₹ 20,000 (All necessary things provided with this set)

2. A set of detailed instructions and guidance

3. One complete Make 4 earphones at the end

4. Be A Part Of A Passionate & Fun Community

settings.title: Will I get a refund if I cancel?
settings.content: No unfortunately, any cancellations would be non-refundable.

settings.title: What is the Final Audio MAKE 4 DIY event?
settings.content: The Final Audio MAKE 4 DIY event is a unique opportunity for audio enthusiasts to explore the art of tuning their in-ear monitors (IEMs) according to their personal preferences. Hosted by Headphone Zone in collaboration with Final Audio, this event offers a hands-on experience like no other.

settings.title: What can participants expect at the event?
settings.content: Participants can expect to immerse themselves in a journey of exploration and creativity as they learn how to tune the MAKE 4 earphones to their desired sound profile. They will receive detailed instructions and expert guidance every step of the way, ensuring they craft an earphone that reflects their individual style and preferences.

settings.title: What will participants receive at the event?
settings.content: Participants will receive the Final MAKE 4 earphones, which include all necessary components for the tuning process. Additionally, they will receive detailed instructions and guidance throughout the event. At the end of the event, participants will walk away with personalized MAKE 4 earphones that are exclusively theirs.

settings.title: Can I take the DIY IEM home with me?
Who can attend the event?
settings.content: The event is tailored for audio enthusiasts who are interested in customizing their listening experience. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced audiophile, you're welcome to join us and become part of a passionate and vibrant community of audio enthusiasts.

settings.title: Do participants need prior experience in audio tuning?
settings.content: No prior experience is required. The event is designed to cater to participants of all skill levels, from beginners to experts. Our experts will provide detailed instructions and guidance to ensure that everyone can successfully tune their earphones to their satisfaction.

settings.title: Will refreshments be provided at the event?
settings.content: Yes, the event will be hosted at Fort City Brew Pub, so participants can enjoy refreshments while they immerse themselves in the DIY experience.

settings.title: Are there any additional costs involved in the event?
settings.content: The event fee will cover all necessary components for tuning the MAKE 4 earphones. There are no additional costs involved beyond the registration fee.

settings.title: Can I bring my own IEMs to the event?
settings.content: The event is specifically tailored for tuning the Final MAKE 4 earphones. While you're welcome to bring your own IEMs, the focus will be on the MAKE 4 series during the event.

settings.title: Will there be opportunities to interact with other participants and experts?
settings.content: Yes, the event provides a platform for participants to interact with fellow audio enthusiasts and experts in the field. It's an excellent opportunity to share knowledge, experiences, and tips related to audio tuning and customization.
